menu.go-premium-header: Support the dev and remove the ads
menu.not-logged-in-header: Log in to save your progress online

stats.title: Stats overview
stats.stat-tooltip: You played {{numberOfRuns}} runs and {{totalMatches}} matches with {{playerClass}} with a {{winrate}}% winrate
stats.faced-tooltip: You faced {{opponentClass}} {{totalMatches}} times with a {{winrate}}% winrate

empty-state.title: Nothing here yet
empty-state.subtitle: Start playing Arena to receive information

owned.dontown: Only the ones I do not have

filters.filter-info-tooltip: Changing these filters will also impact the stats displayed in the decktracker in-game

rank-group.per-day-tooltip: Show the rating at the start of each day

matchup-info.reset-button-tooltip: Reset the win/loss stats of the current deck. The previous matches will still appear in the replays tab.
matchup-info.reset-confirmation: Your win/loss stats have been reset.
matchup-info.delete-confirmation: This will permanently delete the deck from all your stats and can't be undone.
matchup-info.delete-tooltip: Delete your deck. This can't be undone. If you just want to hide it, consider archiving it instead.

deck-summary.archive-button-tooltip: Archive this deck (you can restore it later)

decks.empty-state-subtitle: Play a ranked match to get started, or check your filters above :)

rating-graph.empty-state-message: Please make sure a unique game mode (Standard, Wild or Classic) is selected above, and check the Bronze / Legend filter.

rank-group.per-day-tooltip: Show the rating at the start of each day

last-warbands.title: Last {{value}} matches
last-warbands.damage-dealt-tooltip: Total damage dealt by each unit. The damage for units with the same name is aggregated, and not split per unit
last-warbands.damage-taken-tooltip: Total damage received by each unit. The damage for units with the same name is aggregated, and not split per unit
last-warbands.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds with this hero to collect some information

warband-stats.community-tooltip: Average total stats (attack + health) on board at the beginning of each turn battle

winrate-stats.community-tooltip: Average winrate (% chance to win a battle) per turn for this hero

mmr.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds with this hero to collect some information

rating.title: MMR / Matches
rating.empty-state-message: Start playing Battlegrounds to collect some information

rows.total-dmg-dealt-hero-tooltip: Doesn't include fights against the ghost
rows.max-dmg-dealt-hero-tooltip: Doesn't include fights against the ghost
rows.battle-luck-explain-link-tooltip: An indicator that tells you how lucky you were in your battles during the run. Click for more info

import.import-deckstring-tooltip: Import a deck code from your clipboard
import.invalid-deck-code-text: We couldn't recognize the deck code that was provided.

stats.deck-winrate-tooltip: This deck's winrate in ranked since {{value}}
stats.deck-winrate-vs-class-tooltip: This deck's winrate in ranked against {{opponent}} since {{date}}

multicaster.player: You will draw {{cardsTotal}} cards from spell schools: {{schools}}
multicaster.opponent: Your opponent will draw {{cardsTotal}} cards from spell schools: {{schools}}

brilliant-macaw.player: {{value}} was the last battlecry card you played
brilliant-macaw.opponent: {{value}} was the last battlecry card your opponent played
brilliant-macaw.settings-tooltip: When you have a Brilliant Macaw in hand, show the last Battlecry card that you played, if any

battle.win-chance-tooltip: Your chances of winning the current battle
battle.tie-chance-tooltip: Your chances of tying the current battle
battle.lose-chance-tooltip: Your chances of losing the current battle
battle.lethal-dealt-tooltip: % chance to kill the enemy hero

composition-not-supported.general: This composition is not well supported, results may be off (reason: {{value}})
composition-not-supported.bug: An unknown error occured, a bug report has automatically been sent out to the devs

battle.sim-sample-link-tooltip: Open a simulation sample leading to this result in your browser

sim.simulate-button-tooltip: Simulate the battle with the new boards
sim.export-button-tooltip: Copy the simulation code to share it and reimport it in the simulator (it's quite big at the moment and doesn't fit in a tweet)
sim.export-confirmation: Simulation code copied to the clipboard
sim.import-button-tooltip: Import a simulation code to populate the simulator
sim.reposition-button-tooltip: (BETA) Find the best positioning for your board. Depending on the number of CPUs and the complexity of the boards, this can take a several minutes, and will use a lot of CPU and RAM.
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-firstpass: Running a few (~50) simulations for each possible permutation to quickly eliminate the least promising ones
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-secondpass: Running a few hundreds (~250) simulations to get the most promising ones
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-finalresult: Running a full simulation on the most promising candidates. This is the longest step and can take several minutes
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-done: Best candidate found, cleaning things up
sim.reposition-button-tooltip-cancelling: Cancelling processes, please wait a short while
sim.empty-state-subtitle: Your first battle will show here after you face an opponent
sim.summon-mechs-tooltip: Gives the minion "Deathrattle: summon three 1/1 mechs"
sim.summon-plants-tooltip: Gives the minion "Deathrattle: summon two 1/1 plants"
sim.sneed-deathrattle-tooltip: How many times has Sneed's Hero Power been used on this minion

hero-stats.matches-played-tooltip: Total matches you played with this hero
hero-stats.turn-winrate-tooltip: Battle winrate per turn (it gives you an indication of when this hero is the strongest)
hero-stats.winning-tribes-title-tooltip: Percentage of each tribe present in average in top 4 warbands

opponents.title: Other opponents
opponents.empty-state-subtitle: Pick a hero and wait for your opponents!
opponents.score-board-tooltip: Recap of all the encounters you had with the other players
opponents.triple-tooltip: Since last fight, this opponent got {{quantity}} tier {{tier}} minions as rewards for tripling

composition.empty-state-subtitle: Older games, or very long games, don't have the turn-by-turn composition stored.

overlay-button.tooltip: Click to show / hide the app window

board.opponent-not-met: You have not fought that player yet
board.stats-share-warning: Multiple distinct minions, as well as golden minions, share the same stats (because of how Battlegrounds is coded)

battlegrounds.empty-state-subtitle: Start playing Battlegrounds to receive information

hsdecks.pitch: hearthstone-decks.net shares Decks played at High Legend for all constructed modes, News & Articles.
hsdecks.next: If you decide to sync to hearthstone-decks.net, Firestone will send them each game you play anonymously with some info about your games (Deck Code, Rank, Game Results)

general.flash-window-tooltip: Flash HS window on your turn, or when the Recruit phase starts in BG
